snippet: Mr. Levenson was an advertising executive who helped produce some of the mid-20th century’s most memorable campaigns for clients like Volkswagen, El Al and Sara Lee.
abstract: Robert H Levenson, visionary advertising executive who helped produce some of the mid-20th century's most memorable campaigns, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Levenson was an advertising executive who helped produce some of the mid-20th century’s most memorable campaigns for clients like Volkswagen, El Al and Sara Lee.

headline.seo: Robert H. Levenson, a Visionary Adman, Dies at 83
headline.main: Robert H. Levenson, a Visionary Adman, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Robert H. Levenson, 83, a Visionary Advertising Executive
